Title: Zingerman's Roadhouse

Breakfast

Breakfast — Zingerman's Roadhouse

Breakfast is served Mon-Fri, from 8:00 am to 11:00 am. Product availability is, of course, subject to change based on the hourly ups and down of life in
the restaurant world. We apologize in advance if we run out of something you had your heart set on! Please ask your to-go specialist or server for items
we might be out of. A separate Brunch menu is served on the weekends from 9am to 2pm.

Breakfast Favorites

Let us brighten your morning with favorite classic breakfast entrées as well as unique Roadhouse dishes, all full-flavored and made with
really good ingredients. Toast is available instead of a biscuit for an additional $1.00.

Spiced Apple Granola & Yogurt
(V, GF)

Housemade granola, made with spiced

apples, Anson Mills' oats, and almonds.

Served with Bellwether Farm yogurt,
and garnished with a drizzle of honey.

$12.00

Lunch

Lunch — Zingerman's Roadhouse

Lunch is served Mon-Fri from 11am to 4pm, and Sat-Sun from 2pm-4pm. Classic all-American comfort food you can enjoy at the Roadhouse or from
your very own home! Product availability is subject to change and we apologize in advance if we run out of something you had your heart set on!

Lunch Specials

Mussels & 'Nduja

Blue Hill Bay mussels sautéed with
spicy Calabrian 'Nduja sausage, fresh
tomatoes, and white wine, served with
grilled sourdough bread. Our 'Nduja
comes from Tempesta Market in
Chicago, winner of a 2018 Good Food
Award!

Small $18.00
Large $30.00

For over 20 years, the Roadhouse has proudly served plump, briny East Coast oysters, which we get in from Foley Fish. All the varieties we
get are raised sustainably and carefully checked by Foley to maintain their 100-plus-year tradition of having incredibly high-quality fish and
shellfish. Check with our team weekly to find out what new oysters we are bringing in, but here are three long-standing favorites that could
be available on our menu: Blue Point, Chebooktook, and Wellfleet. We also offer a chef's choice of $2 oysters for Happy Hour, Mon-Fri

2pm-6pm! Come on by for a really great deal!

Artisanal Cheese Selections

The Roadhouse doesn't mess around when it comes to cheese! We bring in the cream of the crop from all over the U.S. for our cheese
board selections, including favorites from our very own Zingerman's Creamery here in Ann Arbor! Any of our artisanal cheeses can be
added on top of a burger or used to make a melty grilled cheese sandwich. Here are a few of our more popular choices, but check in with
us daily to see what made the cut: Hook's 7-Year Aged Cheddar, Pleasant Ridge Reserve, Kenny's Farmhouse Kentucky Rose, and

SarVecchio 18-Month parmesan.

Blue Plate Specials

SUNDAY Grillades and Grits

supper of New Orleans; a Creole-
smothered steak served over Anson

Dessert Menu

Celebrating a special occasion with us? The Roadhouse can order a cake for you from Zingerman's Bakehouse with 48 hours notice! Just give us a call
at 734.663.3663. If you plan on bringing your own dessert, we do charge a dessert fee of $5.00 per person.

4/6

Description: Bustling locale offering hearty American comfort fare, local draft beers & a gourmet food shop.

summary.snippet: "They offer high quality food like a grass fed burger and a variety of oysters."
"Enjoyed the free bread, BBQ beef sandwich, mashed potatoes and fries"
"Service was great, atmosphere was comfy, and price was questionable."

most_relevant.description: Absolutely fantastic experience! The food was incredible – the BBQ ribs, in particular, are a must-try. Perfectly tender and flavorful! The service was just as impressive! Our waiter was wonderful—he gave us a warm welcome and provided a perfect introduction to the menu, making sure we had all the details we needed to choose the best dishes. This place is popular over the weekend, so I’d recommend booking a reservation to avoid waiting.

The best Cajun fries I've ever had. Super friendly staff. My waitress brought a sample of their. Mac and Cheese with chicken. It was great. My only issue was with my blackened fish. One piece was well seasoned, but the other two were not. Otherwise I would give them a 5 stars

Zingerman's Deli has been a place my family has been coming to for many years, so it was finally the time to try the Roadhouse! We were very impressed by how large the restaurant is (even so, get a reservation!), and how it strikes a perfect balance between casual & upscale. The food was delicious, and the staff was very understanding of our dietary restrictions. If you enjoy BBQ are in the area, this place is a must!

I love this place! I usually get a red-eye, but occasionally, I get food.  Today, I got sweet potato fries and a grilled chicken sandwich.
I'm loving the sweet potato fries! The grilled cheese is delicious, too, though.

Absolutely the worst and most expensive lunch I ever had sever was very unfriendly
Had a burger 🍔 ordered medium WELL. Asked if the fries were Crispy fries  she said yes
Fries were cold and soggy   She immediately replaced them and didn’t come back again for another 20 minutes
Burgers 🍔 were medium rare I would say a good vet could have revived it. My son also asked for medium well. His was even worse wish I had gotten a picture
The cloth napkins were greasy and the water tasted like fish
The server did offer to bring another hamburger but we have a two hour drive home and didn’t have the time to wait.  After having made the 2 hour drive for a doctors appointment at Mott’s children hospital
Did Not offer to make an adjustment for the inconvenience
Did not apologize  in fact acted quite off putting After asking for a box she took my plate without a word and boxed it herself. Which I really don’t care for people touching my food
Please find another place to dine. I have no idea 🤷‍♀️ how they have such a high rating

This place was next level in many levels. There were so many gluten free options I had a tough time choosing. The pimento mac and cheese (with bacon) was so creamy and delectable, you don't miss the gluten at all. The same can be said for the gluten free fried chicken.

It was apparent that the folks working there love this place, and are huge fans of the food. Lots of local, or specialized sourcing really shines through.
Amazing food! Staff was attentive and personable. Best collard greens I've ever had. Steaks were perfect. We will definitely be coming back

We enjoyed a lovely lunch here outside on the patio. Our waiter was incredibly friendly, attentive and very pleasant. The food is super yummy and the portions are huge. The prices are somewhat high. However, the quality of the food outweighs the price.
They have lots of Gluten Free/Friendly options on their menu.
I highly recommend Zingerman's. I always take family and friends here who are visiting from out of town and they love it.
